CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Baptism - Kennard Field was the scene of a baptising last Sunday. Elder Charles Beck, radio pastor baptises a large number of converts in ceremonies at the field.  In former years he conducted his baptismal in Ohio River. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Elder Charles Beck at microphone addressing large crowd and baptismal candidates, for baptism at Kennard Field, Hill District
